name: Yasmo Live
overview:
Yasmo Live, a market leading, realtime networking, mobile app for conferences, exhibitions and events. Yasmo Live has been specially designed to enhance the experience of attendees and increase revenues for event organisers.

Recent events where Yasmo Live has been deployed include, MOBILE 2.0, Silicon Valley, MobileMonday, Helsinki and Tallin, The i7 Summit, Paris and Technology World (UKTI), London, Blomberg Conference in New York, Venturefest at Oxford University, CUTEC at Cambridge University and The New York Forum.

We all realize that the key to the success of an event or conference is the networking and interactions among the participants, content providers and organizers.

Among the many features and benefits:

For participants Virtual real time profile exchanges, â€œwho is here?â€ alerts and contact queries to others on Yasmo Floor plans, schedule, and links to speaker’s bio’s Meeting arranging that syncs to major calendar and contact systems in real time Online aggregator of all notes, CRM data and follow ups directly from the phone on return home (no cards, bumping or other need to transfer data) Questions to speakers live from the phone onto the screen Live voting, polling, evaluations and feedback Live video streaming

For Organisers Additional revenue through targeted advertising and sponsorship Bridges the gap between online social networking and live events (embedded twitter, FB, Linkedin) Connects directly to your audience via mobile Conducts realtime polls and event feedback and offers post conference detailed analysis Year round marketing opportunities through online network aggregator Up to date event information; push notifications to inform attendees of any schedule changes or general event information

For Exhibitors or providers of content Generate additional revenue through targeted advertising and sponsorship Links to website, pdf’s and additional marketing information Bridge the gap between online social networking and live events Event and exhibitor information Advertising platform and permission marketing targeting for coupons or offers

Stephen McGowan , Head of ICT Operations at UKTI - â€œYasmo Live is a welcome addition to the resources we offer our delegates, and to the measurement tools we use to make Technology World as productive an event as possible.â€

Sascha Haselmayer, General Director at Living Labs Global - ‘We are proud to be the early adopters of such an innovative networking tool at our conferences.â€™

Gregory Gorman, co-founder of the Mobile 2.0 Organizing Committee - ‘Yasmo Live is a great new service that fits perfectly…..We look forward to using the powerful event analytics it provides through delegatesâ€™ use of its on-site networking features.’s.’
